dc_title_s: Factory site at Edgewater, N.J. opposite 120th St., New York City
dc_description_s: Map showing property lines of various factories along the Hudson River in relation to the pierhead and bulkhead lines for riparian rights.|Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection|No date given - date inferred from collection|Descriptive paragraph of why it would be advantageous for a manufacturing company to purchase the property in relation to locale, riparian rights, etc.
